system.description: This spell creates an ethereal passage through wooden, plaster, or stone walls (not other materials). The phase door is invisible and inaccessible except to you. You disappear when you enter and appear when you exit. You can take one other creature (Medium or smaller) through, costing two uses. The door does not allow light, sound, or spell effects through. You can set triggering conditions so other creatures can use it (based on name, identity, alignment, or observable qualities). Subject to dispel magic. Can be made permanent with permanency.
system.target: Ethereal 5 ft. by 8 ft. opening, 10 ft. deep + 5 ft. per three levels
